Description:
Detects the creation or removal of a computer. Can be used to detect attacks such as DCShadow via the creation of a new SPN.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Add or Remove Computer from DC
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (eventid = '4741' or eventid = '4743')
